clir.control.query

Class CrossLanguageQueryHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • clir.control.query.QueryHandler
      • clir.control.query.CrossLanguageQueryHandler

  • public class CrossLanguageQueryHandler
extends QueryHandler
    The Class CrossLanguageQueryHandler: Implements querying with automated query translation. Implemented as a singleton.

    This processing is completed in 5 steps:

    First step: Pre-processing for each language

    Second step: Translation for each language pair

    Third step: Post-processing...

    Forth step: Matching or searching in every index

    Fifth step: Combining the results Stanfords PoS taggers used here. Connection to MultiWordNet also established here. Translation with Apis from Apertium and Google are initiated here but implemented in clir.control.utils.TranslationHandler. Support for Moses translation belongs there as well.

    Author:
    Gabriel
